title: GD do you like dragons ?
body:
If so, what kind ?
Some examples of the physiology:

Snake [Asian] 

http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120202093433/dragonball/images/6/6e/Shenron-psd61189.png

http://img03.deviantart.net/8675/i/2011/109/7/6/chinese_dragon_by_zero_position_art-d3eeo62.jpg

Humanoid?

http://art.artist.dragoart.com/luster-dragon_1_000000012277_1.jpg

http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100202010934/monsterrancher/images/e/e7/Dragon_2.jpg

Classic

http://orig14.deviantart.net/7e11/f/2009/098/d/9/black_dragon_by_benwootten.jpg

http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/10/100733/2110193-green_dragon_by_maddrawergirl.jpg

Wyvern

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/zelda/images/9/9f/Argorok.png/revision/latest?cb=20090513010311

http://cdn.imgs.tuts.dragoart.com/how-to-draw-a-dragon-from-skyrim_1_000000017302_5.png

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

http://pre09.deviantart.net/381d/th/pre/f/2014/140/1/7/dragon_girl_by_zephyravirgox-d7j3p5n.png

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/monstergirlencyclopedia/images/2/2b/Dragon_0.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20130524001533

Semi/Wingless, flying is overrated

http://wiimedia.ign.com/wii/image/article/815/815712/dragon-blade-wrath-of-fire-20070824050130522-000.jpg

http://www.ultimatemark.com/arts/images/characters/df_pluto.jpg

Cat

http://wm.schoolofdragons.com/SoD/Joomla/templates/schoolofdragons/images/DTV_cg_toothless_05-1st_image.png?v2

I really like dragons that can stand, it probably looks intelligent and emits a respect-worthy aura. What made me first realize that I liked dragons a lot is this, believe it or not: Maleficent boss on Kingdom Hearts.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/5TG40bX0LFk/maxresdefault.jpg

http://www.khwiki.com/images/thumb/b/be/Maleficent_(Dragon)_KHBBS.png/350px-Maleficent_(Dragon)_KHBBS.png

You can probably tell I love dragons from the digimon series, like these guys.

Machinedramon
http://img02.deviantart.net/a246/i/2015/091/9/0/_machinedramon__by_lorddragonmaster-d8o1vrb.png

Flamedramon
http://dma.wtw-x.net/DMA/DigimonStands/Toei/Flamedramon.gif

Yes I like Charizard too.

What about you, GD?
